about.meta.title: About — Mari Rodrigues Photography
about.hero.title: I’m Marina.
about.hero.subtitle: I tell stories of people and places through cinematic photography.
about.story.text: I love creating memories through my lens. My work focuses on meaningful experiences and timeless moments — especially in Barcelona, a city where art lives in every corner and ordinary moments become unforgettable.
about.closing.title: Let’s create something meaningful together.
about.closing.text: If my work resonates with you, I’d love to hear your story.
about.hero.name: I’m Marina.
about.hero.lead: A photographer and visual storyteller focused on telling stories of people and places through a cinematic lens. I don’t just take photos — I create experiences. Moments that feel natural, intimate, and timeless. Based in Barcelona, I’m deeply inspired by the city’s light, textures, and quiet poetry — a place where art lives in every corner and every moment has a story waiting to be told.
about.section.title: About Me
about.section.subtitle: Hey, thrill seeker.
about.section.paragraph1: My work lives somewhere between photography, cinema, and storytelling.
about.section.paragraph2: I’m drawn to honest emotion, natural beauty, and moments that unfold without performance — the quiet in-between, the golden shadows, the gestures you don’t rehearse.
about.section.paragraph3: With a background in content creation, makeup, and filmmaking, I guide each photoshoot as a complete visual experience — from atmosphere and styling to movement and emotion.
about.section.paragraph4: Whether photographing people, couples, or creative projects, my intention is always the same: to create images that don’t just document a moment, but invite you back into it.
about.facts.subtitle: Experiences that shaped how I see, feel, and create.
about.facts.one.title: Roots
about.facts.one.text: Born and raised in Santos, Brazil. Although I hold a degree in Business, visual storytelling has always been my true passion.
about.facts.two.title: The world as a classroom
about.facts.two.text: I spent four years working onboard cruise ships, traveling constantly and learning to observe people, cultures, and fleeting moments.
about.facts.three.title: Barcelona
about.facts.three.text: After moving to Barcelona, I fell in love with guiding people through the city and creating photoshoots that feel personal, cinematic, and real.
about.cta.title: Let’s tell your story
about.cta.text: If you feel connected to this way of seeing and creating, I’d love to hear from you. Wherever you are, let’s create something meaningful together.
